title: Bands, early 19th century
medium:
Medium: linen, horsehair
Technique: needle lace with ground of loop & twist with twist return
dimensions: H x W: 14 x 86 cm (5 1/2 x 33 7/8 in.); repeat: 2 inches
description: Point d'Alençon style with a design of detached buds and borders of sprays of leaves and flowers within scallops of picot cordonnet.

tombstone.epitaph:
Bands, early 19th century.Medium: linen, horsehair
Technique: needle lace with ground of loop & twist with twist return. 1939-66-18-a,b.
